get.summary: Get a list of all companies

get.summary: Get daily ratio time-series for a company
get.description: Returns a daily time-series for the specified ratio. The ratio is recomputed for each trading day using the closing share price for that day and the most recently reported fundamental inputs (e.g. EPS, shares outstanding) available as of that date.

schema.description: ID of the ratio (e.g. ratio_price_to_earnings)

parameters.description: ID of the ratio (e.g. ratio_price_to_earnings)
parameters.name: ratioId
